[quote=“exps35, post:3, topic:96498”]Thanks alot man.
When I run it though, it never finds the bitmap. It just exits and goes on to the next one. Is this possibly because it’s a pop up? Maybe its just the bitmap I used? I took a screenshot then copied the ‘add to friends’ button onto a 75x4 canvas which I saved as a 24-bit bitmap.
Have any ideas on how to fix that?[/quote]

Does it change at all?

When I run it though, it never finds the bitmap. It just exits and goes on to the next one. Is this possibly because it’s a pop up? Maybe its just the bitmap I used? I took a screenshot then copied the ‘add to friends’ button onto a 75x4 canvas which I saved as a 24-bit bitmap.
Have any ideas on how to fix that?

item.title: First script. Tons of errors :P
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[code]program MyspaceBandWhore;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
ATF, Tmp : Integer;
Friends : string;

procedure AddAndClose;
begin
if(FindBitmap(ATF, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(‘Found AddtoFriends…Attempting to add’);
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000);
Mouse(735, 59, 1, 1, true);
Wait(300);
end else
begin
WriteLn(‘AddtoFriends not found…exiting, and not adding :(’);
Mouse(735, 59, 1, 1, true);
Wait(300);
end;
end;

begin
SetUpSRL;
ATF := LoadBitmap(‘C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\My Pictures\scar bitmaps\add.bmp’);
ClearDebug;
Friends := Readln(‘How many friends are you adding? (Only numbers)’);
repeat
Mouse(257, 443, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000);
AddAndClose;
Mouse(382, 443, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000);
AddAndClose;
Mouse(505, 443, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000);
AddAndClose;
Mouse(625, 443, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000);
AddAndClose;
Mouse(752, 443, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000);
AddAndClose;
Mouse(837, 443, 1, 1, true);
Wait(2000);
Tmp := StrToInt(Friends);
Tmp := Tmp - 1;
WriteLn(‘You have been whoring myspace friends for’ + TimeRunning);
until(Tmp = 0);
FreeBitmap(ATF);
end.[/code]

I basically fixed errors, when the script runs it asks you how many friends to do and such.

Read full topic

item.title: First script. Tons of errors :P
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Can anybody shape this up for me and show me what I did wrong?

I made it for www.Friendr.com, which is a site that lets me easily add myspace friends. My neighbor wants me to make a script that will add a bunch of myspace users to his band profile, and unfortunately I suck at this.

Basically, when you click on on a persons picture at the top, it gives you a pop up with the option to “Add to Friends”. Then I want it to exit the pop up and go to the next picture. After all of them are clicked, you can just click an arrow and a new set up profiles comes up.

program MyspaceBandWhore;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
var
ATF: Integer;
x, y: Integer;
const
Friends= 10; //How many friends you wish to add



Procedure AddAndClose;
  Begin
  if(FindBitmap(ATF, x, y)) then
    WriteLn('Found AddtoFriends...Attempting to add');
    Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
    Wait(4000);
    Mouse(735, 59, 1, 1, true);
    Wait(300);
   end else
     WriteLn('AddtoFriends not found...exiting, and not adding :(');
     Mouse(735, 59, 1, 1, true);
     Wait(300);
  End;

begin
  SetUpSRL;
  ATF := LoadBitmap('C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\My Pictures\scar bitmaps\add.bmp');
  ClearDebug;
  Repeat
  Mouse(257, 443, 1, 1, true);
  Wait(4000);
  AddAndClose;
  Mouse(382, 443, 1, 1, true);
  Wait(4000);
  AddAndClose;
  Mouse(505, 443, 1, 1, true);
  Wait(4000);
  AddAndClose;
  Mouse(625, 443, 1, 1, true);
  Wait(4000);
  AddAndClose;
  Mouse(752, 443, 1, 1, true);
  Wait(4000);
  AddAndClose;
  Mouse(837, 443, 1, 1, true);
  Wait(2000)
  WriteLn('You have been whoring myspace friends for' + TimeRunning);

  until(Friends/5)

end.

Read full topic
